About

Dysania

(n.) - the state of finding it hard to get out of bed in the morning

Hi! We're Rails Girls Summer of Code 2013 students from Los Angeles, California.

For the next few months, we'll be working on the Discourse project, under the guidance of our coach, and mentors Robin Ward and Sam Saffron.

If you feel like it, you can find us on GitHub, or contact us at dysania.la@gmail.com.

Vyki Englert

@toastergrrl
